function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of COVID-19 in workplaces, learning environments, businesses, and industry.","Impact":"Severe disruption of personal and professional lives, high infection rates, and casualties.","Mitigation":"Implementing strict health and safety protocols, promoting remote work and online learning, and reducing physical interactions in workplaces and public places.","Technologies":"Remote communication tools, contactless technology, air filtration systems.","People":"Workers, students, business owners, the general public.","Owner":"Employers, educational institutions, business owners, government and public health authorities."}]}
